title: How to Make Pineapple Butter

steps.headline: Put the pineapple pieces, apple pieces, lemon juice and water into a saucepan.
Place the lid on the pan and cook gently for 30-40 minutes.
steps.description: Stir frequently using a wooden spoon. The mixture is ready when the fruit has softened.

steps.headline: Pour the mixture into a food processor or blender.

steps.headline: Pour the purée into the pan and add the sugar.
steps.description: The amount of sugar should be adjusted as explained above. Cook over gentle heat, stirring frequently. Keep cooking until the sugar dissolves.

steps.headline: Bring the mixture to the boil.
steps.description: Cook for about another 15 - 20 minutes while stirring occasionally. You are aiming for a thick and creamy texture.

steps.headline: Remove from the heat and stand for 5 - 10 minutes to cool slightly.
Pour the mixture into jars.
steps.description: Cover each jar with a wax paper circle and cellophane. Fasten with a rubber band or elastic.

steps.headline: Label with the name and date.
steps.description: It is now ready for storage or as a gift.

tyn: Sterilised glass jars for storage and/or gift presentation
Ribbon, twine or raffia for decoration
